snippet: Following news over Barclays’ role in the Libor rate-fixing scandal, more attention is being paid to the British Bankers’ Association, the powerful trade group that oversees Libor.
abstract: British Bankers' Association is gaining more attention in the wake of Barclays' role in the Libor rate-fixing scandal; powerful trade group oversees key interest rate that affects trillions of dollars worth of corporate and consumer loans each year.
lead_paragraph: Following news over Barclays’ role in the Libor rate-fixing scandal, more attention is being paid to the British Bankers’ Association, the powerful trade group that oversees Libor.

headline.seo: The Gentlemen’s Club That Sets Libor Is Called Into Question
headline.main: Trade Group for Bankers Regulates a Key Rate
headline.print_headline: Trade Group For Bankers Regulates A Key Rate
